name: 1-800-Flowers.com, Inc.
description: 1-800-Flowers.com, Inc. is a leading floral and gift retailer, known for its innovative approach to e-commerce and customer service. Founded in 1976 by Jim McCann, the company started as a single flower shop and has since grown into a multi-channel retailer with a diverse range of products and services. 1-800-Flowers.com offers an extensive selection of floral arrangements, gourmet gifts, and personalized items for various occasions, including birthdays, anniversaries, and holidays. The company operates multiple brands under its umbrella, including 1-800-Flowers, Harry & David, Cheryl's Cookies, and The Popcorn Factory, catering to different customer preferences. With a focus on quality and customer satisfaction, 1-800-Flowers.com has established itself as a trusted source for gifting solutions. The company embraces technology to enhance the shopping experience, providing customers with convenient online ordering and delivery options. Additionally, 1-800-Flowers.com is committed to social responsibility, engaging in various philanthropic efforts and sustainability initiatives. The company's mission is to help customers connect with their loved ones through thoughtful gifting and memorable experiences.

seo.meta_description: Explore 1-800-Flowers.com, a leading retailer for flowers and gifts. Discover a wide selection of floral arrangements, gourmet gifts, and personalized items for all occasions.

faq.question: What does 1-800-Flowers.com offer?
faq.answer: 1-800-Flowers.com offers a wide range of floral arrangements, gourmet gifts, and personalized items for various occasions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of 1-800-Flowers.com?
faq.answer: Chris McCann is the CEO of 1-800-Flowers.com, Inc.

faq.question: Where is 1-800-Flowers.com headquartered?
faq.answer: 1-800-Flowers.com is headquartered in Carle Place, New York, USA.

faq.question: What are the main product categories of 1-800-Flowers.com?
faq.answer: The main product categories include Floral Arrangements, Gourmet Gifts, and Personalized Gifts.
